name: PEACE
description:
Peacetime, in contrast to wartime, is the state of relations between various social subjects using unarmed means to resolve the contradictions between them.

According to R. Jackson, after 1945 there were only 26 peaceful days on the planet. The creation of a peaceful society is a common human problem at the moment. Large international political and thematic organizations, for example, the World Peace Council, have worked and are working to solve the problem.
